channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Parliament of Catalonia
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Parliament of Catalonia

item.title: Opinion Poll by GAD3 for La Vanguardia, 1–4 September 2020 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Ciutadans–Partido de la Ciudadanía: 8.0–13.1%
  • Junts pel Catalunya: 16.7–23.4%
  • Esquerra Republicana–Catalunya Sí: 23.7–31.1%
  • Partit dels Socialistes de Catalunya (PSC-PSOE): 16.0–22.6%
  • Catalunya en Comú–Podem: 4.9–9.1%
  • Candidatura d’Unitat Popular: 2.6–5.9%
  • Partit Popular: 4.7–8.9%
  • Vox: 2.8–6.2%

item.title: Opinion Poll by GESOP for CEO, 25 June–21 July 2020 – Seat Projections for the Parties

  • Partit Popular: 5–9 seats
